lead_paragraph: The 7,500 miles that separates those in Queens from their family and friends weighed heavily, producing pangs of helplessness as they refreshed Facebook pages and listened for ringing cellphones.

headline.print_headline: Nepalese in Queens Anxiously Await Word From Kin
headline.main: Nepalese in Queens Anxiously Waiting to Hear From Relatives After Quake

snippet: The 7,500 miles that separates those in Queens from their family and friends weighed heavily, producing pangs of helplessness as they refreshed Facebook pages and listened for ringing cellphones.
abstract: Nepalese communities in Queens anxiously await news of their friends and family abroad in wake of devastating earthquakes; sense of helplessness is pervasive as death toll continues to rise.
